content.title: Work Experience
content.subtitle: Everyone once started somewhere. Everyday is a chance to learn something new.

workHistory.description: Hired as a full-stack developer to maintain internal projects and some client projects.
keyContributions: Maintain some BigCommerce client websites
Developed custom automation scripts with Python for multiple clients
Led the development of a custom site crawler app and in charge of the overall front-end development
Led the development of a custom mobile app for wine social networking business
Led multiple headless e-commerce sites development and in charge of overall development both frontend and backend

workHistory.description: Hired as a full-stack developer for their internal projects including their company website, multiplymii.com among others.
keyContributions: Maintain their company webiste, multiplymii.com, along with a small dev team among other internal projects.

workHistory.position: Full Stack WordPress Developer and Front-End Developer
workHistory.description: Hired as a full-time full stack WordPress developer (WordPress) and front-end developer (for the company’s SASS platform)
keyContributions: Assisted the lead WordPress web developers in providing solutions to various WordPress websites (ecommerce and company websites)
Performed theme and plugin development for various WordPress websites
Worked with a small team of full stack web developers to establish an internal SASS platform for the company (Web App Stack: React, Redux, Laravel, Redis, MySQL, NodeJS)

workHistory.description: Hired as a freelance web developer to work on Shopify sites and static sites using JAMstack
keyContributions: Worked on a web project and apply Hugo static site generator for web development.
Worked on a Shopify project to add a custom functionality as per request by the client.

workHistory.description: Hired as full-time full stack WordPress developer.
keyContributions: Worked with a small team in developing a real estate plugin for various clients.
Performed theme and plugin development for various WordPress websites.

workHistory.description: Hired as a full-time full stack web developer by various clients (many to mention here)
keyContributions: Worked with the CTO in serving various client’s website needs.
Maintained, developed, and designed websites for various clients ranging from WordPress sites to custom websites developed other than WordPress.

workHistory.description: Hired as a full-time full stack web developer by my friend who happened to be the manager of a local company here in Davao City, Philippines.
keyContributions: Worked with the manager in serving various client’s website needs.
Maintained, developed, and designed websites for various clients ranging from WordPress sites to custom websites developed other than WordPress.

workHistory.description: Hired as a freelance front-end developer / project manager by a client to handle project management and development of his vocabulary and assessment management system.
keyContributions: Hired a small team of developers to help design and create the aforementioned web application.
Contributed to the development of the application by providing additional code to the codebase.
Applied project management skills initially learned and utilized tools including Microsoft Project and Trello.

workHistory.position: Full-Time Webmaster / Virtual Assistant / SEO Specialist
workHistory.description: Hired as a full-time webmaster to handle various existing websites (Easter Car Show, Western Pest Control, and Leadership Dixie)
keyContributions: Performed SEO techniques (on-page and off-page) in the aforementioned websites.
Utilized Google Analytics and Google Webmaster during the SEO process of the aforementioned websites.
Handled server management among the aforementioned websites with cPanel.
Provided various reports to the client through spreadsheets and word documents.

workHistory.description: Hired as a freelance, front-end developer to design and develop client websites.
keyContributions: Gained new experience in developing better web layouts with the use of Twitter Bootstrap.
Applied responsive web design into the client’s web application (Susumamas: Family and Youth Health Services)
